Can anyone create a currency of any name they want?

No, that's not correct. To create a currency of a specific name, you need to control an ID of the same name. The controller of this ID is the only one who can create a currency of that name, and they can only do so once. So, for example, if you want to create a currency called "gold@", you need to control the ID "gold@".
